# Buildcheck Rules Docs

## BuildCheck rules

- [Index of rules](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/buildcheck-rules/index.md): A complete list of BCxxxx build check errors.
- [BC0101](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/buildcheck-rules/bc0101.md): Learn about .NET SDK error BC0101, which occurs when an output path or intermediate outpath is shared between multiple projects.
- [BC0102](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/tools/buildcheck-rules/bc0102.md): Learn about .NET SDK error BC0102, which occurs when multiple tasks attempt to write to a single file.
